languages.text: Через несколько дней Вольный Торговец получает доклад, к которому приложен запечатанный конверт с компроматом и ларец с парой мизинцев и кончиком языка. Шантажист больше не выходил на связь.

Several days later, the Rogue Trader receives a report along with a sealed envelope containing the damning evidence and a small box containing two little fingers and the tip of a tongue. The blackmailer never makes contact again.
languages.original_text: Через несколько дней Вольный Торговец получает доклад, к которому приложен запечатанный конверт с компроматом и ларец с парой мизинцев и кончиком языка. Шантажист больше не выходил на связь.

traits.locale_text: Several days later, the Rogue Trader receives a report along with a sealed envelope with the damning evidence and a small box containing two little fingers and the tip of a tongue. The blackmailer never makes contact again.
The population was suspicious of the sudden religious fervour. However, rumours of an investigation soon disappeared.

Several days later, the Rogue Trader receives a report along with a sealed envelope containing the damning evidence and a small box containing two little fingers and the tip of a tongue. The blackmailer never makes contact again.
The population was suspicious of the sudden religious fervour. However, rumours of an investigation soon disappeared.

Several days later, the Rogue Trader receives a report along with a sealed envelope containing the damning evidence and a small box containing two little fingers and the tip of a tongue. The blackmailer never makes contact again.

languages.text: Quelques jours plus tard, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} reçoit un rapport ainsi qu'une enveloppe scellée contenant les preuves incriminantes et un coffret contenant deux petits doigts et le bout d'une langue. Le maître-chanteur ne fait plus jamais parler de lui.
languages.original_text: Several days later, the Rogue Trader receives a report along with a sealed envelope containing the damning evidence and a small box containing two little fingers and the tip of a tongue. The blackmailer never makes contact again.

traits.locale_text: Quelques jours plus tard, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} reçoit un rapport ainsi qu'une enveloppe scellée contenant les preuves incriminantes et un coffret contenant deux petits doigts et le bout d'une langue. Le maître-chanteur ne fait plus jamais parler de lui.

languages.text: 数日後、自由開拓者は忌まわしい証拠の入った封書と、2本の小指と舌先の入った小箱とともに報告書を受け取った。脅迫者が接触してくることは二度とないだろう。
languages.original_text: Several days later, the Rogue Trader receives a report along with a sealed envelope containing the damning evidence and a small box containing two little fingers and the tip of a tongue. The blackmailer never makes contact again.

traits.locale_text: 数日後、自由開拓者は忌まわしい証拠の入った封書と、2本の小指と舌先の入った小箱とともに報告書を受け取った。脅迫者が接触してくることは二度とないだろう。

languages.text: 几天之后，行商浪人收到了一份报告，还附带着一个封好的信封，里面装着确切无疑的证据和一个小盒子，盒子里装着两根小指和一段舌尖。在那之后，勒索者再也没有发过任何消息。
languages.original_text: Several days later, the Rogue Trader receives a report along with a sealed envelope containing the damning evidence and a small box containing two little fingers and the tip of a tongue. The blackmailer never makes contact again.

traits.locale_text: 几天之后，行商浪人收到了一份报告，还附带着一个封好的信封，里面装着确切无疑的证据和一个小盒子，盒子里装着两根小指和一段舌尖。在那之后，勒索者再也没有发过任何消息。

languages.text: Varios días después, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente recibe un informe junto a un sobre sellado que contiene las pruebas incriminatorias y una cajita con dos meñiques y la punta de una lengua. El chantajista no vuelve a ponerse en contacto.
languages.original_text: Several days later, the Rogue Trader receives a report along with a sealed envelope containing the damning evidence and a small box containing two little fingers and the tip of a tongue. The blackmailer never makes contact again.

traits.locale_text: Varios días después, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente recibe un informe junto a un sobre sellado que contiene las pruebas incriminatorias y una cajita con dos meñiques y la punta de una lengua. El chantajista no vuelve a ponerse en contacto.

languages.text: Einige Tage später erhält {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einen Bericht sowie einen versiegelten Umschlag mit den unwiderlegbarne Beweisen und ein Kästchen, in dem zwei kleine Finger und eine Zungenspitze liegen. Der Erpresser meldet sich nie wieder.
languages.original_text: Several days later, the Rogue Trader receives a report along with a sealed envelope containing the damning evidence and a small box containing two little fingers and the tip of a tongue. The blackmailer never makes contact again.

traits.locale_text: Einige Tage später erhält {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einen Bericht sowie einen versiegelten Umschlag mit den unwiderlegbarne Beweisen und ein Kästchen, in dem zwei kleine Finger und eine Zungenspitze liegen. Der Erpresser meldet sich nie wieder.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, günler sonra bir rapor alıyor. Rapora mahkûm edici kanıtı içeren damgalanmış bir zarf ve iki küçük parmakla bir dilin ucunu içeren küçük bir kutu eşlik ediyor. Şantajcı, bir daha iletişime geçmiyor.
languages.original_text: Several days later, the Rogue Trader receives a report along with a sealed envelope containing the damning evidence and a small box containing two little fingers and the tip of a tongue. The blackmailer never makes contact again.
